title: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A fresh and light salad with grilled chicken, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and a balsamic vinaigrette.

title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
description: A nutritious bowl of quinoa, black beans, corn, avocado, and a zesty lime dressing.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Whole grain toast topped with smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of sea salt.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A colorful mix of stir-fried vegetables, including bell peppers, broccoli, and snap peas, served with brown rice.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Creamy Greek yogurt layered with fresh berries, granola, and a drizzle of honey.
